content.detailedDescription: I've been taking random pictures in front of my house, which faces nnw with a digital camera now for about two months. there was a lot of ufo activity at first, but for the past several weeks, nothing has shown up until today. i did not notice the object until i loaded the pictures on my computer. it is very obvious at the three o'clock position. if you zoom in on the object, it shows detail. there also appears to be a white round object near the right bottom just above the date.
content.summary: Taking random pictures of the sky, as before and discovered the object at about three o'clock. when zoomed in on, it shows detail.

content.detailedDescription:
I looked out kitchen window, there up in the sky, quite close,
i saw five lights, in a circle, but the object seemed tilted.
content.summary: Tilted disc with white lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Alright 23rd june, 2007
incident location: panchkula, sector- 12, haryana ( chdandigarh) india.

i was walking with my friend. we saw a helicopter sort of thing. taking the glimpse of it ....I said its ufo.. i was joking at that time. i guess law of physics quantum works. so yea, it was a ufo.

its shaped- looked like a helicopter moving in a very bizarre way leaving behind different colours of tail.

we thought for a second some one is burning crackers up in the air to celebrate something. but to our great surprise we realize it was a ufo, coz many other people also sighted it. but the one we noticed was totally different. it was flying at the range of approx. 200 kms up in the air and making an angel of 45 % ( my eye and that ufo) from the place where i was !
we didn't lose the sight of it. it was there all the time pacing slowing leaving behind its beautiful different colour tail. apparently we did lose the sight if it as we were walking and when we tried to trace it in the air later, there was no sign of it. i guess it didn't move fast. rather more slow than a helicopter speed ! but basically to give you an india of new sort of ship. however i did try to click the picture of it unfortunately the mobile i possed at that time was of low clarity and since it was dark , one could hardly make out what was in that photo.
content.summary: Noticed helicopter shaped.( not clear tho)...Moving in a very bizaree way leaving behind different colours of tail. slow movement!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down 7th ave and baseline when my wife saw a brightlights coming from  south mountain it looked to be 5 or 600 yards west of the radio tower. we pulled over to watch it and we saw what looked to be a pattern of dimming. than about 2min into it we saw on light to the left of the first light come in and begin to blink in and out then a third light would apear in the middle and do the same. i notice that they would go and out randomly in sync they never moved. so after 5 min of watching it we headed to the inlaws to get there camera when we came back one light was blinking as we began to take a shot it would disapear like ti new what we was trying to do. so i put the camera into record mode and it disapeared totaly. after sitting there for 5 min nothing came about. i was shocked and amazed cause once we go the camera it into record mode it just stopped.
content.summary: 3 light sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 8 pm. i walked outside and looked up at the stars. to the east of our house i saw what looked like a very large, bright star. at first i thought it was a planet, but then realized it was much larger and brighter than anything i had seen before. i kept staring at it wondering what it was and i noticed that there seemed to be different colored lights blinking in it also. there was green, red, and blue that i could see. it clearly wasn't a plane because after approximately 10 minutes it had not really moved. i then called my daughter and mom out to see what they thought of it. my mom was the first to notice that it seemed to be moving, although because of the distance it was very slight. as we watched it, we noticed that it would move slightly in all direction, stopping after each move. but by my view, it never appeared to move more than a couple of inches on the sky and stayed in one specific area.

i told my daughter to go get the camera because it had 48x zoom and i have used it in the past to get pictures of birds that were too far away to tell what they were with the naked eye. one i found it in the camera lens on max zoom i realized that it looked more like a ball or oval shape and was hovering then moving very quickly back and forth as if it were ploting points on a map. i took several pictures with the camera on "action" mode. we then stopped to view the pictures on the screen and the camera had captured an object moving that left streaks of multi-colored light behind it. we all took turns looking at it through the camera and taking pictures. there were approximately 70 pictures made of the this. 

eventually we noticed a plane flying toward it coming from the oposite direction. this ufo was in the east upper horizon of the sky but below all the stars. once the place was almost overhead us but slightly to the west. the ufo flew up and back, hesitated for a few seconds and then disappeared.
content.summary: At first glance looked like a big star but had blinking different colored lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Though i don't know what i saw, i am not discounting the great possibility that it was a shooting star that i witnessed december 12th just after 9pm while waiting for the firework show to start at the epcot center. the sky was clear, the stars were bright and the epcot lights were dimmed or off in preparation for the fireworks display. it was very cold that night and there was a biting breeze that blew occasionally off the water. while sitting on a bench in the viking country of epcot, i witnessed what appeared to be something like a star or ball of light that seemed to appear out of nowhere, moving away from me, east to west in a slightly arching line, quickly across the sky, for a few short seconds before disappearing. it seemed a good distance away and it didn't seem to cover much sky before vanishing. my family was not paying attention to the sky when i tried to point it out to them and it happened too quickly anyway so i was the only witness. i've seen plenty of shooting stars before and this did seem to have similar characteristics but i thought it might be helpful to report this to you just in case it could be something more. 

i felt excited to have witnessed such a thing but wondered if it was a piece of nature i saw or something other-worldly. i was not afraid and did not feel threated. i only had a sense of wonderment and curiosity. as i said before, it appeared out of nowhere almost as quickly as it disappeared into the darkness of the night sky.
content.summary: A small ball of light, no unlike a star, moved across the sky, east to west, until it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
At 17.35 pm on the 19th december 2008, after dark, 7 bright orange ufo's flew over waalre, the village i live in. they flew in an distinct formation. they made absolutely no sound. were bright orange and circular. from my distance they looked the size of a green pee. 
i have two eye witnesses that saw them also at another location in waalre! there were no flickering lights or noise to be heard as is the case when you see regular aircraft. i saw them for about 3 minutes until they passed over my house.
when i checked on google later that night, i found that there are more reports of orange ufo's all over the world.
is there really something going on?
i have made two foto's via the camera on my phone. i will now check to see the quality of them on my pc.
when i first noticed them, i saw them through my kitchen window downstairs. when i raced up to my upstairs window i saw that there were more following. after i opened my window i heard no sound! at firs when i saw the first object, i thought it might be mars because it is also orange. then i thought it might be a plane, but there were no flickering lights and no noise!!!!
they flew in a formation, that they stayed in very accurately. flying straight on from veldhoven towards maastricht. steady flight. not slow, not fast, but steady. at a constant spead.
bright orange circular objects. to bright to see the posible actual structure that made the bright light.
i was in amazement and excited enough to call my parents, who then saw them also from their backyard.
i am still amazed! i lost sight of the objects after they flew over my house.
content.summary: 7 orange ufos fly over waalre in formation.

content.detailedDescription: Well the last time i called you and i saw this in heber i watched it for about 2 to 3 hours with my father for some of the time.  later that night i was sleeping in muy fathers motor home and i felt something and woke up.  all the sudden i couldn't move  i couldn't yell or speak. i felt him or it on my back and i freeked out and faught it off me but as i was doing so i started spinning around in the bed physically.  after i got him  off me.  i laid awake a little concerned about what just happened.  aany way it is out there right now in the southern sky.  once again i say if you still would like to go to heber sometime and probably check one out feel free.  john  (p.S.  i think i am soposed to go with them tonight from what they said,  i was just thinking i should probably have shapporone.  you know some of the things that they do are kinda adult if ya know what i meen.)
content.summary: A light in the sky moving right now.

content.detailedDescription:
Honolulu hawaii over looking kahala.  was using my new camcorder i got for x-mas to zoom in on the city and then appeared some star like lights.  it started off as two lights and they were moving in unison together.  i was not sure what it was so i just followed it with my camera.  the lights were so far away that i could not see them with the naked eye.  i could only see them through the view finder.  as it moved behind a building i went ahead and started to record. 

 

the two lights turned into three.  then the three turned into four.  all lights were traveling at a constant speed with one another so that made me feel like it was one piece instead of each light being separate.  the distance of the craft was pretty far away.  a rough guess would be that the craft was about 700-1500 ft long.  i used this as  a reference by noticing it went behind haunama bay which is very far away.  i have pictures and videos that i uploaded to youtube because when i try uploading it on here, it kept giving me error messages.

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=fjb2xvqq3ss

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=lt8tydazqhq&feature=channel

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=cgmq1rkylym&feature=channel

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=2emtzq5dvis&feature=channel
content.summary: Ufo changes form or multiplies.

content.detailedDescription:
Hereunder is the sighting and photos of a french family which was witness to a ufo sighting near geneva from french border.Translation is my own.I have joined yesterday the mufon network and do not know precisely your modus operandi yet.

a minor took these photos and her and her family wish to remain anonymous.Her email (first name is cecile is hereunder though) 
please keep her name anonymous as i have definitely promised this to her family.

photos when zoomed up show six orbs forming second light not visible to the eye when sighting occured

bonsoir john,
 good evening john
voici donc un r���cit de ce que l'on a vu hier  dimanche 7/12/2008 vers 17h15 (les photos sont not���es ��� 18h15...Car je n'avais pas chang��� l'heure ���t��� hiver !!)
 here is the story of our sighting of sunday dec 7th 2008 around 5 15 pm (photos show 6 15 pm as hadn t changed to winter time yet)
etant situ��� dans la haut jura, les t���l���phones portables passant mal, quand j'ai re���u un appel, je me suis dirig���e vers ma baie vitr���e (comme ��� notre habitude) qui est plein est, afin de mieux recevoir.
 as i live in the high jura mountains cell phones cannot go through well so i went to my large window to receive better , my window is full east.
et c'est ��� ce moment que j'ai vu 1 grosse lumi���re au loin au dessus de la suisse (difficile d'���valuer la distance), apr���s avoir raccrocher mon t���l���phone, j'ai appeler ma famille afin qu'elle vienne voir, et je suis all���e chercher mon appareil photo (apn avec objectif 70-300mm - 6mpx),
 thats is when i saw at a disatnce a big brilliant light above switerland (difficult to evluate ditance) after haniging up , i called my family so they could watch tooand went to get my camera (apn with 70 300 mm lense 6megapixels).
pour nous cette lumi���re ne pouvait ���tre une ���toile (trop grosse ?) et tr���s lumineuse. nous avons pens��� ��� un avion (puisqu'il y a l'a���roport de gen���ve), mais pour nous la forme ne bougeait pas et la lumi���re ���tait trop grosse, nous avons l'habitude de voir les lumi���re des avions (nous avons d'ailleurs v���rifi��� plus tard), et elles ne sont pas si grosses, m���me quand ils allument le "gros phare", cel��� n'est pas si gros, de plus le ciel ���tait parfaitement d���gag���...Pas un nuage, temp���rature n���gative, temps froid et sec (pour dire, il a fait -10 dans la nuit).
 for us this light couldn t be a star (too big) and too luminous.We thought it could be a plane (as geneva s airport is closeby)but the light wasnt moving and was too brilliant.We are used to seeing plane lights including the very powerful beams and they are not that big.Besides the sky was cristal clear , no clouds and under freezing point temperature cold and dry.
je suis donc sortie sur mon balcon afin de prendre des photos, mais la 1���re a ���t��� loup���e car je n'avais pas pos��� l'appareil (je ne suis pas pro, et il n'y avait pas assez de lumi���re), donc apr���s j'ai chang��� d'endroit, j'ai pos��� mon apn sur ma barri���re, et j'ai pris 2 photos.
 i went out on my balcony to shoot the photos but missed the first one(not a professional)so i changed area , put my adn (digital camera) and shot two more photos atuomatically.
ensuite, nous avons regard��� encore un moment, puis la lumi���re a disparue  dans un scintillement in���gal "orange", elle est revenue comme on l'a vu, puis a compl���tement disparue.
 we then looked a while then the light disappeared in a fuzzy unequal orangy colour , came back as we saw it again then disappeared fully.
quand je parle de la lumi���re, c'est celle qui est la plus grosse, c'est en mettant les photos sur l'ordinateur que je me suis aper���ue qu'il y avait une 2���me lumi���re (forme bizarre en grossissant fortement l'image, avec plusieurs points lumineux). je pr���cise que nous ���tions 4 ��� regarder cel���, et aucun des 4 n'a vu cette 2���me lumi���re (peut ���tre trop focalis���s sur la 1���re ?). les 2 photos ont ���t��� prises ��� 14s d'intervalle.
 when i speak of the light it is the larger one.It s ones photos loaded on my computer that i noticed there was a second one (bizarrely shaped as when fully zoomed one can see a few smaller lights).We were four to watch this event and noce of us saw the second light.Both photos were taken at 14 seconds apart.
pour nous, la lumi���re n'a pas boug��� (en tout cas nous n'avons pas vu de mouvement), c'est en voyant les 2 photos que guillaume a mis sur le forum, avec l'axe trac���, que nous voyons qu'il y a eu d���placement.
 for us the light didn t move (we havent seen any movement) and it s by seeing the photos on the ids forum with a axis traced that we saw movement.
j'ai regard��� ce soir ��� la m���me heure, m���me temps (-5���c, et temps ciel d���gag���), je n'ai rien vu.
 i looked tonight at same hour and saw nothing.
pour l'orientation : la photo est quasi plein est, la droite de la photo le nord, donc la gauche de la photo le sud, les fils que l'on voit c'est une ligne haute tension.
the orientation of the photo is full east with north to the right handside and left being south.The wires seen are electrical.
les photos ont ���t��� prises avec le 300mm, mode scene de nuit, la ligne haute tension est ��� environ 300m de chez moi, et les 1er sapins 500 m.

je me tiens ��� votre disposition pour de plus amples renseignements.
 at your disposal for further details

salutations
c���cile
content.summary: Observation ufo over swiss french border sent from new  mufon member in france.

content.detailedDescription:
My older brother (edward e.) and his friend (steven w.) were driving back from our cabin in northern minnesota via elk river when my brother (riding as the passenger in the front seat) sighted a strange object over the elk river power plant (note: this power plant was nuclear in the 60's, but no longer is) and actually asked the driver to stop so he could get a better look. after stopping and getting out of the vehicle they both took turns viewing the disc-shaped object which had lights on it and did not appear to be moving. after a short time of viewing the ufo left the area at an extremely high rate of speed (unlike anything man-made). in just a few moments the reason for the departure of the ufo was very evident - fighter jets had been deployed and came streaking across the sky, but they were "too late" to intercept.
my brother still has clear recolection of this sighting and i do not think that he has previously reported it.
edward servied honorably in navy intelligence and i respect his story.
david e. cpa
content.summary: Ufo sighted with binoculars over the elk river (nuclear) power plant.

content.detailedDescription: The nearest thing to the sun ive seen as i live in england you will not know of failsworth were this happened i was walking home from finishing work at 5 pm in fails worth ,was a old mill which was a old cotton mill with a chimney 150 feet high which was common to see at the top of the chimney was this red brigt ball like the sun it made no noise , it was just floating as the road i was on is a long road (the old roman rd)i could see it for a long time it never moved just floated obove the chimney i got home for my mother to tell me i was late home by a hour why i dont know,after seeing friends i went to bed at 11 o clock about 4 in the morning i awoke to see my bed room light up like the sun had rose early  looked out of the window to see the same red fireball traeling over a neigbours roof  after that i dont know where it went after many years ive seen a silver ball near to were my perants had moved house too, about 9 years ago i was watching tv in my flat as my father was ill and i had moved to be near them the same silver ball formed over the window of the flat spilt into 3 i dont know how but it did and this is the best way i can tell you when you down load a file you see a pice of paper pass over to a file it felt as if mt brain was being read , all what they wanted to know was taken out , it left me drained it then spilt into 3 again and left as if was never thier some info the mill was a old cotton mill it was called the lawtex mill it is now been pulled down the roman rd is still thier failsworth is in the bourgh of oldham near to manchester what ide like to know is as anyother people had the same experence i have had my e mail addy is fynan59@yahoo.Co.Uk thanks terry
content.summary: Large red bright fireball.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 6;37pm on wednesday night i pulled into a filling station and began pumping fuel into my car.  i noticed several peculiar looking amber lights in the southern sky about 30 degrees above the horizon.  that placed the lights above the fort gordon military reservation.
   the lights were obvious even through a barren tree and power lines partiall obscured the field of vision.  at first i thought the lights may have been fireworks or perhaps flares but the color of the lights were unusually pure color and did not "flicker" as do illumination or anti-missile flares.  
     the first lights exhibited short-range movenment and fadded away within 4 to 5 seconds, they all dissappeared within a second of each other.
     then about 4 seconds later another 3 lights appeared (also amber in color) equadistant from each other in a horizontal plane but exhibited variable relative motion so i do not think they were connected to each other.  then a fourth amber light appeared and crossed in front of the other three in a left to right motion. there may have been a slight "trail" behind this light.  after approx 5 seconds each light fadded away, also within 1 or 2 seconds of each other.
     i suspect that these lights were in fact conventional objects in that they appeared to be incandescent in nature, even though they were of a very pure color with no sparks.  it is entirely conveivable it was a re-entry of a satellite viewed as it approached the observer.
content.summary: Short duration amber colored lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was on continental flight 1500 out of ft lauderdale enroute to newark ,nj , at 4:30 ( i checked the time) i observed a very black dot against the white clouds out the right side of the aircraft. i estimated several miles away - visibility was good 35000 ft.  it seemed like a smoke cloud getting slowly larger and then looked like the shape of a long triangle sitting still, then flattened out and looked like a line of black going opposite our direction. i tried some digital pictures but only got a fuzzy black line. i thought possibly military? but i have never seen the very black trail before. we were above the clouds, probably not seen from the ground / ocean. i did speak to the pilot, who stated he did not see it. i am curious as to what it was or if anyone else saw it.
content.summary: Very black  dot  to triangle to line  - like smoke trail.

content.detailedDescription: At 455 pm, traveling southbound on andrews av, approaching oakland park bl, i saw a fireball travel west to east.  it was twelve noon, in front of me, and descended on an approximate 45 degree angle towards the atlantic ocean. it was very bright with a small tail.  possibly from the setting sun to the west??  more than likely it was a meteor, but a very interesting daylight sighting of some sort.  did anyone else see it?
content.summary: Meteor/shooting star/fireball

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It hovered over a distant area in front of my house in collegeville, pa.  at first it seemed to be up high in the air, like with the stars, however after it started moving (see below) i realized it was only a few hundred or a thousand feet up likely, around the height in the air that a small 1-2 passenger plane would fly.  

i was putting out the garbage when i noticed this yellow, seemingly "pulsing" or "flickering" object/light in the sky.  it caught my eye.  at first there were actually two yellow lights in the sky, sort of next to each other.  both seemingly not moving, however shortly after going outside and noticing these the one on the left moved out of site towards the left.  i assumed that was a plane and didn't witness it "hovering" long enough to assume otherwise.  the other object stayed in one location for approximately 5 minutes.    
 
after about 5-7 minutes it started to move to the right slowly.  then eventually it slowly moved towards my house and flew over my neighborhood.  up until this time i wasn't sure if it was a helicopter, or what it was?  as it got closer the yellow light seemed to be only light, meaning nothing else was blinking like on a plane or helicopter, and when i looked at the light it was almost like when you stare at something and your eyes don't focus quite right, presenting a prism effect coming out of the bottom of the object.  i would say that there likely wasn't actually something coming out of the object - rather i was just seeing the light reflecting strangely.  this "reflection" of light coming from the object looked like an asterisk shape almost.  

the strangest part of this experience, and the part that leads me to believe this wasn't a plane or helicopter, was how slowly it moved and that it did not make a sound.  it was very quiet where i was standing, and the sky was as clear as could be.  in the time it took this object to fly from the distant spot where i saw it first, until it has passed by my neighborhood, i was able to witness many other planes fly into and out of my visable area.  in fact, while it was almost directly overhead, there were other planes, large passenger planes, flying at a much higher distance than this object - and i could see them and hear them, and they would completely come into my visable area and then go out of my visible area all while this object passed by slowly.  i would estimate that approximately 6-10 other planes came into sight during the time the object was flying towards me and then left my sight as this object was still passing by.  as i mentioned, i could hear the other planes, but when the object was the only thing in sight, i could not hear the object.  

overall i watched it for approximately 20 minutes.  the shape of the object seemed circular or spherical.  it was an orange-yellow color.  see attached photo (sorry it's not very good).  i lost sight of the object after it flew over the wooded area behind my house.
 
i'm not sure exactly what i saw, but i know that it was awesome and had my heart pumping.  it easily could have been something explainable, but i'm not sure what?  for how close it was, how much noise it made (zero!), and how slowly it crept across the sky, coupled with the hovering when i first noticed the object - i believe definitely something odd was viewed.

i do also have a short video of this object, but it wasn't moving in the video and i couldn't get the shot very focused.  it is 30 seconds long.
content.summary: Yellow (sometimes pulsing with light) object hovered in distance then moved right then flew overhead going extremely slow with no noise at all.

content.detailedDescription:
About twenty people and i (many of us were engineering student at escola de engenharia de lins) were training karate that evening on a basket ball courtyard (not covered, so we could see the sky) at colegio salesiano dom henrique de mour���o in lins, s���o paulo state, brazil.
we were working out on the floor (the courtyard lights were off), and then someone shouted: look at the sky! look at the sky!
so we saw that huge object on the sky, passing by, silently (no noise at all). it took about 5 minutes. coming from the east toward west. we could figure out about 500 m from ground. it was beautiful and very impressive due to its size and all those spot lights on its bottom side.
i was twenty years old and i felt something like a revelation about extraterrestrial civilization. our karate trainer, a colleague from the same engineering school, dismissed us from the karate class that day and we remained in the local area talking about what had happened for about half an hour and then we went home.
i was so excited when i arrived home (a student house) and i tried to share my experience with my room-mate and other colleagues. they started joking on me and i gave up telling my story. 
two days latter, there was a great commotion in the city because it was reported the case of maria cintra on a public hospital (the clemente ferreira hospital).
some weeks latter there was the case of tor���bio pereira. those cases can be seen on the internet in many sites.
a week latter maria cintra gave a press meeting and i attended to that meeting, when i saw her reporting about what had happened with her on august 25, 1968. she reported about the landing of a pear shape object and a woman that asked her for water (aruma).
the reporter that organized that meeting was saulo gomes from gazeta popular a brazilian newspaper at that time (i am not sure about his correct name and the newspaper). but this reporter was also involved with the varginha case, and i saw him at the television, several times. concerning the case of maria cintra i am witness of what she said at that press meeting, and i have read several articles in the internet about her (all of them just like she reported, with a few variations).
for several months after that day, many important people in the city reported other ufo sightings.
until now i hadn���t enough courage to tell publicly about that personal ufo experience. i am now a retired university professor from am important brazilian university and i finally decided to share my ufo experience (you can find about me in the internet just typing my name on a searching site and see several science articles i have written for important science societies).
from that day on i started reading about ufos and i learned a lot about it. mainly about their psychological influence over or mind. 
there are many sects that follow religion and psychological approaches. and i keep my christian faith in spite of the disturbance on my beliefs that followed that experience.
content.summary: A huge (it looked like a 100 m long) oval object, dark, with many spot lights on the bottom side.

content.detailedDescription:
Turning on the streed where i live, (harvest green) i noticed in the corner of my eye a black oval moving up and down in the distance, i pulled out the camera thinking it was a plane. however the object did not have visible wings. my daughter thought it was a bird but then it changed directions and zipped over to a different spot in the sky then after a zig-zag it proceeded to act similar to a plane flying slow and controlled until out of sight.

approximate 40 seconds of video taken.
content.summary: Dark oval - erratic movement.

content.detailedDescription:
While trying to fly from lake ozark to union, missouri in a small plane, we had to navigate around thunder showers that had lightning in them. after visability deteriated, we turned back towards the lake ozark area that was clear of the storms. my passenger was facinated with the clouds and colors, and as the sun was starting to set he started taking pictures, perhaps around 5:30 pm. my passenger just recently opened the pictures, he had forgotten about them actualy, and i had to go back in my flight log to get the date when the pictures were taken. his favorite picture was one with storm clouds all around with a clear sky behind. there is orange colors casting off some of the clouds, and is very beautiful. when he decided to enlarge this one particular photo and make copies to send to people, he noticed what looks like a smudge. as he zoomed in on the smudge, it took up an appearance of a perfect triangle. it appears to be on the other side of the storm clouds that create the illusion that we are flying in a cave. the air was unstable, very moist, and we were watching thunder showers appear and disapear in a matter of minutes. there was considerable lightning strikes that, although were several miles from the aircraft, made my passenger nervouse. as i was turning the aircraft to dodge water shafts and cloud colunms, my passenger started taking the pictures at random. we only have the one photograph, i do not know if he scrutinized the rest of the photos.

before i got the call to check out the smudge, my passenger had sent me this link to report such events. i have had your mufon site on my computor since...12-2-08, as i had told him the story of what happend to my uncle and his brother in law in the canyon of the gunnison, colorado while on a fishing trip. that is a story i should have past along to you, but for now here is just a photo. it's interesting, but i am not sure what it is. i did some calculations with respect to the aircrafts possition which i believe was 250 to 260 degrees. my passenger was taking pictures from the right side of the aircraft and forward. i estamate the camera was looking perhaps 280 to 300 degrees. in that direction, some 150 miles distant, is whiteman airbase. that is where b-1 bombers are kept. or is it b-2 bombers that are shapped like a triangle? thanks, bob
content.summary: While flying around lake ozark, we took a picture of clouds and a storm and cought a triangle object in the picture.

content.detailedDescription:
i cannot remember the exact date, i am close if not correct dec  11 or 12th 2:02 a.M. -weather -cloudy? (no stars visible)
ok first of all i have no idea what this "thing" "was" that i saw,
 just seeing it made me feel confused,because it was 2 a.M.!!
i was on my 15 min cigarette break at work, and where i work u are not allowed to smoke on campus so u have to drive out off grounds so im driving to the smoking area which is just a few turns,curves and a little stretch of road, while i was driving.. to my right there is a big field with tree lines pretty far back.While driving on the tree line was this round orange glow, i was like?? sun? moon? and like questioning my thinking like duh no its not the sun!! its 2a.M.  and i was thinking it was just the moon..And in the back of my mind thinking i never saw an orange moon in dec or yet as much one that low  that big this time in the morning..So i got to the smoking area.And from there this object" i thought was the moon . or had myself convinced was the moon was not visible. i parked, had my cigarette break usually 15mins. drove back down that very same road.Still kind of intrigued and fascinated by the color of this object, which i dismissed as a "moon"on the way back t object was no longer there. i went inside and told my co-workers about what i saw and that it was probrably just the moon.


(the very next night) 
i went on my cigarette break @ 2- a.M.
it was a clear night. i looked out into the field and tree line to see if i could see anything similar to what i had seen the previous night.I didn't.....
what i did see .... i looked "up" and out my cardoor window and i seen the moon ! it was a clear bright night and there were stars.The moon was defnately not orange, nor was it anywhere close to where the object i seen the night before was. and  it was bigger than the moon was..
so i guess i just wanna know if anyone knows what i may have seen or..If it could be anything of significance.
thank you for listening.
content.summary: visual of  a  round very illuminated  orange glow  2 a.M.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in a nearby field to my home walking my dog when i saw three strange orange lights hovering in the sky. they then dissapeared without flying away but rather just into thin air. i thought mabye an airplane or helicopter but the object didnt move but rather stayed stationary? an exciting experience and i will be out every night until i see this object again.
content.summary: Saw strange orange lights in the sky that hovered.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting in our spa last nite, he was sitting in the seat direction facing the sky. he saw 3 red lights one larger hovering (he did not say anything to me, because we read in the newspaper there were training excercises being conducted in our area. he went in the house and i took his seat and was looking out into the sky and i seen 3 amber colored lights flying oddly (like hovering) one larger than the other. then there appeared other objects in the sky that resembled flickering stars flying darting in the sky, at times as many as 6 or 7 appeared darting, dont know where they came from. it was a nice show of lights, and i thought the same thing as my husband. he came out for a minute and i told him what i witnessed and he said he seen the same thing, and it was probable an airforce exercise, he went inside. i stayed to witness more star-like things racing across the sky. then i heard coming from the direction of our airport what sounded like a large airplane, i looked in the diredtion of the noise and seen what resembled a row of stars flickering on and off following one another, it seemed to go on for a minute or two. it sounded like all the flickerings made one noise.  i called the police dept and they did not know anything, i called the number in the newspaper that reported the exercise, and they said the training was over long ago. called our fort gordon and the person there is suppose to get back with me. thanks for listening, ilene
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Husband and i seen 3 amber lights one larger hovering, while we were in our outdoor spa, then i seen later very long line of star like planes(?)

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at my laptop and glanced outside the window to see the white sky it has been dumping snow. well i notice something that looked kind of like a giant black balloon or a blimp something you would see at a sports game. it was completely black had no light and was round. it was moving upward over the trees as it went over the trees it was moving downward.... i couldn't see anything after that.... i have no clue what i could have been...???
content.summary: It was like a big black ball or a blimp no lights to it. it was moving upward then went over the trees and went down from there i could see no more.

content.detailedDescription: I was camping near linville falls near wiseman's view. from my campsite i could see table rock in front through the trees. i saw what i thought was a helicopter come from the right and hover above the mountain. it stopped and hovered. i was watching for the brown mountain lights. i have seen them many time but never in the sky above the mountain. i went to wisemans view to get a better look accross the mountain. there in the barren trees on top of the mountain i could see a white light flashing. this i recognized as a brown mountain light. in the sky to the right above the mountain i could see the object flashing red lights like a helicopter. the lights would flash red and white.The one in the sky would move up and down and appear to move farther away at times then return to the same spot. the light on the mountain seemed to coincide its flashing with the red light flashing. sometimes they would flare at opposite times resembling communication. i dissmissed the possibility of a helicopter due to lack of noise and the movement of the object. i watched for some time and very faintly i could see other lights in the sky behind the first. they would appear then fade out. it was an overcast night and i could not see any stars. this lasted for an hour or more. it finnally faded out and i went back to camp where i could still see the light on the mountain. i will go back with a video camera next time and hopefully capture an event like this on film.
content.summary: Lights flashing above the mountain.

content.detailedDescription: Sorry i cant type that much but would be glad to speak with someone about this happening on the marine base.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object with lights along sides like passenger plane.

content.detailedDescription: On december 12, 2008 at 4:32 pm est, i looked out my office building window and saw a fast moving teardrop shape object flying across the sky at a high rate of speed.  the sun was already dipped below the horizon, and there were clouds in the sky.  i noticed it flying through the clouds at first.  i immediately ran down the steps and out into the parking lot of my office building on south warner road, king of prussia, pa.  i was pretty much jumping down stairs to get this shot.  i was able to take the shot and continued to view it traveling into the distance and disapear.  it was pretty big.  the light poles you see in the photo are about 20-25ft high, and the lamps are pretty huge.  there was nothing like it in the sky.  man this thing was amazing to see in person.  i heard no sound to indicate a normal explanation for this fast moving craft.  it wasn't small, and stood out like a sore thumb.  i am not sure if there are any other witnesses, but i did show my colleagues at the office what i cought on my camera immediately after it happened.  i imagine someone had to see it other than me, but i didn't even stop for a second...I wanted to get a pic as quickly as possible.   i was facing westwardly when this picture was taken.
content.summary: Looked out my office building window saw a huge glowing teardrop shape craft ran outside toop picture.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi.  i have often thought of reporting this over the year's but really didn't think it would amount to anything since i had no proof - video, audio or physical.  at the time this was taking place, a nuclear power facility was being constructed in midland within 5 miles of my home and the sighting took place within a half mile of the cooling pond planned for the facility.  later, due to the facility sinking into the ground far further than planned, the plant had to be scrapped almost causing the collapse of consumers power - the public power facility.

i was driving my 1976 subaru from my house on poseyville road in midland while accompanied by a neighbor girl, *name omitted for confidentiality* who lived literally next door.  as a 17 year old boy, i was pretty much in the mode most 17 year olds are in... i was looking to get closer with charise as she was attractive and we seemed to get along fairly well.  we were just two high school students simply going for a drive on what was probably a weekday evening.    

i remember that we went about 2 miles down poseyville road from my house and turned left (east) onto gordonville road - just talking, with me trying too hard to be cool.  next we turned right (south) onto sasse road and shortly after, one of the strangest things in my life occurred.  i don't remember seeing or sensing anything until after we'd been driving roughly a quarter mile down sasse road.  we were travelling quite slow at the time - perhaps 25-30 mph.

suddenly an object started to appear in the top right corner of the drivers window... actually it was more of a light, and i don't recall ever seeing an outside edge or shape of the object that emitted the light that was very clear to us.  whatever the object was, it was fairly low in the sky - perhaps 100 feet off the ground.  as it appeared, i pointed to it and my passenger and i were both immediately amazed... it wasn't like anything we had seen before.  the sky was quite dark, but it wasn't long after nightfall and the object's "bottom lighting" stood out from what must have been a dark colored bottom of the flying vehicle.

once it was clear that the object was completely past us (it was only travelling maybe 10-15 mph faster than we were - and i had slowed down dramatically) the only thing that was clear were three pale pink "bars."  the three bars ran aside each other - side by side - with the center bar being a simple rectangle of a pinkish hue - and the other two being rectangles of the exact same dimensions, except with an additional "leg" or small square of light sticking off from the rectangle opposite each other facing away from each other.  it looked like a letter l - next to a letter i - next to a backward l with the bottoms of the letters at the front of the "craft" or at least at the leading edge given the direction they were travelling.  if i absolutely had to give a guess as to their size, i would say the each bar was roughly 50 foot long and 8 wide - seperated by perhaps a 3-4 foot space filled only with darkness,

i seem to recall that you couldn't see anything through the dark space, indicating that there was something there - but you just couldn't see it.  we both saw the same thing and compared notes later in amazement... they had come from behind us - which would have put them directly over dow chemical companies large chemical plant, the nuclear plant in construction and certainly they'd travelled over the cooling pond for the proposed plant - although we only saw the lights over our heads on sasse road.

we both either felt, heard or somehow sensed a slight buzzing or vibrating sensation when the lights were nearest us.  i tend to think of it more as a feeling and less of a vibration as i believe we thought the "craft" was silent... but there was defininately some type of sensation accompanying the sighting.  although there were three bars "flying" parrallel to each other - neither of us suspected for even a moment that there was more than one device in the sky near us - the bars of light all appeared to be locked into one main body, not waivering at all or changing dimensions in any way.  

we drove along at roughly 15-20 mph for some time with the craft in sight almost hovering above us but moving forward just barely faster than we were - and just above us not changing speed or hieght.  after perhaps a half mile or mile of this, the craft seemed to change angle slightly- as our perspective on the lights changed... with the bars becoming "thinner."  it also seemed to raise its angle upward at the same time.  then it took off in the strangest manner, disappearing into the sky very quickly and leaving no trace of any kind.

when it "decided to take off" we could certainly tell.  it took enough time for us to see the small changes, but when it accelerated it was like its speed increased exponentially - starting off more slowly but very rapidly accelerating off into the distance.  i don't remember hearing as much as sensing a change in the frequency of the vibration we both "felt" related to the craft and likely its propulsion system.  the pitch and frequency became very high (in sound terms - approaching 4-6khz whereas when the craft was travelling more slowly the frequency we felt was more in the 150hz range).

i haven't talked to a lot of people about this and i rarely saw my passenger again after that - but i've always wondered if she reported it and wanted to confirm her tale should she have decided to tell it. i've never heard of anyone seeing a ufo with the kind or color of lighting this apparent craft had... i would assume that its overall shape was round at front and the rest of it shaped like a rectangle - or at least, that was the impression i had - despite the lights being laid out in a rectangular pattern with two squares sticking out the sides.

i'm almost 50 now and enough information is out there that this might actually fit into some other story helping to confirm something down the road.  thats why i felt it was important to tell.  i've seen a few lights in the sky before, but this was not the same and was surely something incredibly unusual.  there is no question that this was some time of mechanical device which appeared to be under intelligent control.  it seemed to actually be inspecting us as surely it could have speeded off well before it elected to - and i am glad i had the chance to experience this.

any official investigator can contact me via email at the address i left above if you have any questions about this.  this took place over 30 years ago and we still haven't released any military craft that could possibly maintain the height and speed this vehicle maintained without generating excessive noise, rushes of air or other sure signs that it is a man made device.  i'd be willing to bet that whatever propelled this ship through our skies - it wasn't a technology that we have perfected on earth at this time - and surely not at that time.

it takes a lot of fortitude to step up and tell stories like this and one can't help but think of what others will think - but who really cares what someone thinks of me at this point!  its more important that someone knows the truth of it and it can then be added to the volume of other similar encounters that could lead us to a better understanding somewhere down the road.
content.summary: Three pale pink bars travelling very slowly at roughly 100 feet and 25 mph - then accelerating rapidly into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in my car and i look up becuse i see something glinting in the sky. i saw what look like a stake with a rounded top just floting there in mid air.I was scared for a moment then i a flash it dissapered.
content.summary: Very short.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 6:47 pm (cst) traveling south on liable road in highland indiana, in the western sky an object passed beneath a small aircraft and proceeded on a western heading. 6:53 object stopped. remained stationary for approximately 35 minutes of active observation. of which 7 minutes has been videotaped. at 7:50 pm, observer returned outside to check sky and object had disappered from view. it was cloudy in the west and object was only thing in the sky. never dipped below horizon and maintained stationary position above treeline. from time of observation object maintained a white balance and briefly changed colors to orange. however, observer cannot comment on whether this was light pollution due to heavly lighted area. upon first noticing object thought of x-files episode "deep throat." as object and plane were on what appeared to be collision course. object avoided plane and passed below it. curiousity prevailed as i have witnessed such events before, but never for this length of time nor have seen object remain like this. lost sight of object after camera ran out of battery and observer returned inside to charge up camcorder. returned to observation at 7:50 and object had disappeared.
content.summary: Object passed beneath aircraft, heading ssw, object moving quickly, and then remained stationary.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a cold, clear winter night in southern illinois.  i was a junior in highschool so i know the year was 1973.  i walked out the back door of my parent's house and was fumbling with a vacuum cleaner as i was placing it in the car.  as i turned around, i noticed this huge, arrowhead-shaped object the size of my neighbor's house, hovering over that house. it was approximately the same length as the residence, one story high and was perhaps 25 feet over their roof line.  it was silent and had 15 white lights along the side.  i was horrified, dropped the vacuum and ran into the house.  i could not breath, i could not speak, i was terrified.  i could not get my disinterrested father to come see the craft and i was certainly not going back outside, so i ran to the kitchen window and continued to scream for someone to come and see this thing.  from this vantage point i could see around the slightly curved front nose to the other side and could see the lights appeared to wrap all the way around.  i could not count them.  after approximately two minutes or so, the craft banked to the east and vanished.  when it banked, i was able to see underneath and could see that the back of the ship was more arrow-shaped than triangular.  it was black and appeared to be metalic.

over the next several weeks , i canvassed all my neighbors and no one saw anything.  they thought i was crazy but i knew what i saw and how terrified i continued to be following the sighting.  two years later at a party, i was approached by a former neighbor named (available upon request) who asked me if i had seen anything in the sky one night back in january, 1973.  she too saw the object which made me feel somewhat better.

the object i saw back in january of 1973 was incredibly similar to the one you investigated in lebanon and milstadt illinois.  i can tell you exactly how big the dimensions were.  i could have thrown a rock and hit the thing. i can still recall how terrified i was that night.

although my parent's house has seen been torn down, the neighbor's house remains and i could show you precisely the spot in which i was standing  when that thing scared the be-jesus out of me.  perhaps this could give you a better idea of the exact size of the craft.


there was one other incident i recall in 1976 (i was going to college, so that is how i remember the date).

it also occurred in southern illinois on the royalton blacktop outside of elkville, il. approximately 7 miles from duquoin.

it was in the summer around the 4th of july, 1976.  i was driving to work, heading east on the  royalton blacktop when i saw a red ball arc up from the woods to my left (north).  i didn't pay any attention as i assumed it was  fireworks from the 4th.

suddenly, the red ball ran parallel to the treetops and then shot across the field in front of my car, perhaps 100 yards ahead, 200 feet from the ground and circled back.  i just lost it!!  this thing circled back and began following me, gaining on me at a high rate of speed.  i was doing 75 mph on a rural highway and was totally in a panic.  i knew there was a 90 degree turn just ahead in the road and i was too afraid to consider slowing down as this thing was gaining on me fast.  suddenly, it erratically shot back to the south across the top of the treeline and was gone.  i pulled off the road and cried for about 5 minutes as i was visibly shaken.

the object was a red, gaseous orb with what appeared to be a solid core of some type.  it was no more than 5-6 feet across andd travelling at a very high rate of speed.

fortunately, i am happy to report, these are my only ufo sitings and both occured in southern illinois, 90 miles from st. louis, 45 miles from hwy 64.  this has haunted me since 1973.  i know what i saw but could not find anyone to corroborate my story.  when i saw your special on the discovery channel and the sitings in southern illinois, i was thrilled to know i wasn't the only one to see these things.  people in the area have jokingly said it might have something to do with the cahokia indian mounds.  that is as plausible an explanation as any one i might have!  i just don't know, but i am happy to get this off my chest.  it is quite cathartic.  thank you for your time.

sincerely,

frances wiggins, dc
17515a tangi lakes drive
hammond, la 70401

phone:  (985)634-4006
content.summary: Arrowhead-shaped object with 15 white lights along the side.
